Twentyfourteen Maven Skin

  • Organizational POM
  • Coding standards
  • Commons testing
  • Java archetype
  • Other projects

Twentyfourteen Maven Skin test

This is a test for Twentyfourteen Maven Skin.

Usage

To use this skin in your project, use the skin element of the site.xml site descriptor:

<project name="xxx">
  ...
  <skin>
    <groupId>net.trajano.maven.skins</groupId>
    <artifactId>twentyfourteen-maven-skin</artifactId>
    <version>1.0.0</version>
  </skin>
  ...
</project>
